entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
